name: Select Flaw
description: Select a flaw to see its description

name: Alcoholic
description: Your character cannot restore resources unless they consume 2 alcohol in a day.

name: Asthma
description: Moving more than 5 spaces in a turn causes your character to take damage.

name: Battle-scarred
description: If you roll an initiative of 8 or lower, your first action will be a Stress Response.

name: Catastrophic Failure
description: Whenever you roll a natural 1, there is a chance the outcome becomes a catastrophic failure, leading to a butterfly effect chain that ends in a disaster. This can occur no more than once a play session.

name: Clumsy
description: Your character occasionally slips up and causes an accident. This can occur no more than two times a play session.

name: Glutton
description: Your character only restores 2 energy per unit of food.

name: Hemophiliac
description: Health regain effects are reduced by 50%.

name: Nearsighted
description: If your character takes damage, roll a passive luck check. If that check fails, your glasses break and you receive a heavy penalty to ranged attacks and perception checks.

name: Panicked
description: Your character is more prone to random sanity loss checks. If ever in combat with overwhelming odds, receive a penalty to all attacks.

name: Restless
description: Your character does not get a Long Rest bonus for resource restoration.

name: Sickly
description: Your character has a rare, incurable disease. Your character now has a daily consumption requirement of 1 special medicine. If starting the game with this flaw, start with 2 special medicine.

name: Unlucky
description: Two times a play session, the ZM can force you to re-roll any roll. Any resources spent on the initial roll are refunded.

name: Unwelcome
description: NPCs will typically start off with a bad first impression of you and generally mistrust you.
